item.title: In search of the real Nikola JokiÄ‡
item.description: A trip to Sombor, Serbia, paints a portrait of the elusive Nuggets star by the people who know him best.

item.title: Sources: No surgery for Commanders QB Daniels
item.description: Commanders quarterback Jayden Daniels has no ligament damage in his dislocated left elbow and will not need surgery, sources told ESPN.

item.title: Ex-WR Brown arrested in Dubai, extradited to U.S.
item.description: Former NFL star Antonio Brown has been arrested on an attempted murder charge stemming from a shooting after a celebrity boxing event in Miami in May.

item.title: Broncos admit offense lagging following ugly win
item.description: Broncos running back J.K. Dobbins was among several players who acknowledged the offense isn't doing the defense "any justice" after an ugly 10-7 win ...
